message: For the emerging buzz, GovLoop is great
Another useful resource for Gov practitioners (though not for e-Gov thought leaders) is http://www.thepublicmanager.org/index.aspx
For Open Gov the following is also great -->  https://opengovdirective.pbworks.com/w/page/1832552/FrontPage

For those of you on Govloop, I invite you to participate in http://www.govloop.com/group/smarterbetteropengovernment -- Our group goals is "Performance is highest in organizations and individuals who are externally engaged. Effective Org Change is most sustainable when mindsets and behaviors are addressed. We exchange leading performance practices in individuals, teams and organizations."
